channel.title: BlizzardRSPS - The new, the fresh, the old. [Hiring]
channel.description:
[CENTER] BlizzardRSPS [URL=http://"http://blizzardrsps.com/"]Home[/URL] [URL=http://"http://blizzardrsps.com/play.php"]Play[/url] [URL=http://"http://rswebclients.com/play/BlizzardRSPS"]External Play[/url] [URL=http://"http://blizzardrsps.com/forums/"]Forums[/url] _________________________________________________________ Although we do not have a logo at this minute, we are working more on the server than our site and mini-features. BlizzardRSPS is a mixed type of a RSPS, we offer a bit of old, a bit of fresh and most of all a bit of new. Attempting to make a multi-genre RSPS for your sakes, hate? Throw it at us, we'll only improve! love? Throw it towards us, we'll take that love into consideration in updates.
Pictures: [img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/4250/8nn0.png[/img] -Working Random Events, can be triggered by random objects around the game also. (Rewarded with 50,000 Coins and 2 Crystal Keys) [img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/9096/lp1y.png[/img] -Fully operational Castle Wars, and 7 other mini-games available to play. [img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/5716/hn0p.png[/img] -Our home, we've worked hard to create what it is now. And we are still only 60% finished with it. Expanding it through-out the castle very soon! [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/6qh5og.png[/img] -We have 13 fully working bosses, mixture of easy-to-hard. Custom,new and old! Most rare drops come from them! [img]http://i.imgur.com/aO3OsPt.png[/img] -Crazy skin colours for your characters!
Not only this , but we have more? You've seen all this kind of stuff before? You'll be surprised to what changes we've made to some most-known and played features.
[b]So lets put into a short list what else we have to offer[/b]: We don't want to hide half of our community away from rares, so we've given everyone a chance of winning Seasonal Items from Penguins which can be located at Rock crabs. They will drop on a very rare scale, White Party-hats and Crystal Keys.
-A community which will mostly support you, have a laugh with you. -A chance to be noticed, veterans will be needed. -Advanced dicing for Donators -Item upgrades -Fully working upgraded Dungeoneering, we hope it's better than any other servers -Lag issue,memory issues and other server hazards have been fixed for excellent up-time and performance. -NPCs are scattered around the game, most shops are at home but some are elsewhere :O -We've got over 96% of our items, perfectly statisticed. (Some customs are excluded) -Not a vast amount of customized items -Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow -Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring -Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated -Player Owned Shops, with most dupes fixed. Reported dupes will be rewarded :) -As seen above, working random events(triggered in-fact). -Mystery boxes, in events shall be given out. Not only this, but as you've hopefully heard before, various activities and events go on.
We're hiring, applications to be sent to Jay via the site, we're expecting quality and strength in leadership and commitment, It's a RSPS? We need professionals in the matter of moderating, we will give trials out to those who may not seem like they are enough for others, but in-fact they are suitable for the job.
Give us a chance, there's nothing to loose, For the last time..
[URL=http://"http://blizzardrsps.com/"]Home[/URL] [URL=http://"http://blizzardrsps.com/play.php"]Play[/url] [URL=http://"http://rswebclients.com/play/BlizzardRSPS"]External Play[/url] [URL=http://"http://blizzardrsps.com/forums/"]Forums[/url] [/CENTER]

item.title: BlizzardRSPS - The new, the fresh, the old. [Hiring]
item.dc:creator: @3owl 3owl
item.description:
@3owl wrote:

[CENTER]
BlizzardRSPS
Home
Play
External Play
Forums

Although we do not have a logo at this minute, we are working more on the server than our site and mini-features.
BlizzardRSPS is a mixed type of a RSPS, we offer a bit of old, a bit of fresh and most of all a bit of new. Attempting to make a multi-genre RSPS for your sakes, hate? Throw it at us, we’ll only improve! love? Throw it towards us, we’ll take that love into consideration in updates.

Pictures:

-Working Random Events, can be triggered by random objects around the game also. (Rewarded with 50,000 Coins and 2 Crystal Keys)

-Fully operational Castle Wars, and 7 other mini-games available to play.

-Our home, we’ve worked hard to create what it is now. And we are still only 60% finished with it. Expanding it through-out the castle very soon!

-We have 13 fully working bosses, mixture of easy-to-hard. Custom,new and old! Most rare drops come from them!

aO3OsPt.png869×547

-Crazy skin colours for your characters!

Not only this , but we have more? You’ve seen all this kind of stuff before? You’ll be surprised to what changes we’ve made to some most-known and played features.

So lets put into a short list what else we have to offer:
We don’t want to hide half of our community away from rares, so we’ve given everyone a chance of winning Seasonal Items from Penguins which can be located at Rock crabs. They will drop on a very rare scale, White Party-hats and Crystal Keys.

-A community which will mostly support you, have a laugh with you.
-A chance to be noticed, veterans will be needed.
-Advanced dicing for Donators
-Item upgrades
-Fully working upgraded Dungeoneering, we hope it’s better than any other servers
-Lag issue,memory issues and other server hazards have been fixed for excellent up-time and performance.
-NPCs are scattered around the game, most shops are at home but some are elsewhere
-We’ve got over 96% of our items, perfectly statisticed. (Some customs are excluded)
-Not a vast amount of customized items
-Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow
-Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring
-Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated
-Player Owned Shops, with most dupes fixed. Reported dupes will be rewarded
-As seen above, working random events(triggered in-fact).
-Mystery boxes, in events shall be given out.
Not only this, but as you’ve hopefully heard before, various activities and events go on.

We’re hiring, applications to be sent to Jay via the site, we’re expecting quality and strength in leadership and commitment, It’s a RSPS? We need professionals in the matter of moderating, we will give trials out to those who may not seem like they are enough for others, but in-fact they are suitable for the job.

Give us a chance, there’s nothing to loose, For the last time…

Home
Play
External Play
Forums
[/CENTER]

Read full topic
item.source: BlizzardRSPS - The new, the fresh, the old. [Hiring]
